reviews.review_msg: Dr. Mellow is one of my favorite professors in the Linguistics department. His lectures are very interesting, and timed extremely well. He is polite and respectful towards students, and available for help. He is a fair marker and very clear in his expectations. You always learn something new in his lectures and he is quite humorous as well.
I don't like his attitude.... Very condescending toward non-native born speakers.
organized, well-prepared, hard working, fair, knowledgable, enthusiastic, nice, helpful, respectful, and student-centered. want to give him a hairstyle makeover though..
